Not me.  I am forever in awe of those people.  Even Ed's Coral Castle is am=
azing to my teeny brain :))  http://www.roadsideamerica.com/story/2056

Don=

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@=

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why do entities lie?

  
  What humans don't get =
is there is more than their punny little intellects/egos here, When "nothin=
g happens" it'll be because we were successful! That is not we as in human!=

 
 Just like Y2K, if no one had taken it seriously, and done no corrective=
 programming, who knows how bad it may have been. 
 
 Don't forget, the May=
ans, and every other culture that has these predictions plotted the orbits =
of the planets and stars, and knew the position of the earth inside the dam=
n galaxy without any freaking computers. There ain't one of you brainiacs a=
live that could do that, yet you'll break out pompus and all knowing! 
 
F-=
S


On Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 4:50 PM, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:

  
>Pr=
imarily the people who care are those selling books about it, making TV  sp=
ecials, putting movies in theaters, and those who have either forgotten abo=
ut all the previous end-of-world predictions that didn't come to pass, or t=
hose who need to feel special by having some 'future knowledge', or who hav=
e been 'chosen' by the spirits, or something.
>
>Well, anyway, I'm sure the=
y will enjoy themselves,  until about Dec 24, 2012, when they'll have to co=
me up with some new date (and then try to avoid the questions about how the=
y could have believed it all in the first place).
>

 From: Frank Sumpt=
ion <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
>>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
>>Sent: Wed=
, December 9, 2009 3:24:46 PM
>>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why do entities lie?=

>>
>>  
>> I've been doing "box" work for almost ten years, and I still ge=
t to the decepticons( liars). Perhaps it's just a level out there, as I thi=
nk there is an inifinite number of levels and/or demensions. Maybe there is=
 a demonic level? I have a group that communicates, and they usually tell "=
this is an apple", a metaphor for a truth. Not all of these voices are spir=
it per se`, some have never been human, there is a group out there called t=
he fish group, a group of entities that exist off planet and really enjoy s=
crewing with EVPers.  I think it was the people-I forget their names, exper=
imenting in Luxemberg quite some time ago that first got the Fish Group. 
>=
> 
>> For me, I don't really care what comes through, it's the fact that so=
mething talks that shouldn't be there, my approach hasd always been on the =
technical side. 
>> 
>> I get some mediumistic contacts/visions, and I have=
 some spirits that seemingly prefer telepathic contacts, but I don't take t=
hat as anymore gosple than anything else. Most of the "communication" tends=
 to be extremely trivial in nature. 
>> 
>> As far as end of the world stuf=
f, I do get that, alot of it, in almost every session, they insist it's tru=
e, at least as far as end of the cycle goes, but, and it's a big but, who k=
nows what level/source that is from--they claim not to be human. Plus we do=
 have access to the future, if I do my meditation regularly I see almost ev=
erything ahead of time, plus I dream it, and I know everyone on this planet=
. I would expect spirit to be much more aware, at least after they reach a =
higher state. Human is not the highest level, so you can't compare everythi=
ng to what y'all think you know. 
>> 
>> Frank-S
>> 
>> 
>> 
>>
>>
>> 
>>On=
 Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 11:47 AM, michellewisbith <mwisbith@hotmail. com> wrot=
e:
>>
>>  
>>>
>>>
>>>Hello, all.
>>>
>>>My name is Michelle. I'm a certifi=
ed medium with a Spiritualist church. This was a two year process which inv=
olved proving I can communicate with spirits to a congregation (not braggin=
g - just trying to explain my background and why I know what I do). I'm als=
o one of the biggest skeptics you'll ever meet (It was one of two reasons I=
 became a medium. I wanted to see how they were "faking" it. Surprise! They=
 weren't). I'd like to contribute what I've learned about spirits. As Jill =
wrote, "I(t) really takes personal experience to believe this stuff exists"=
.
>>>
>>>As to her main question of "Why do spirits lie", I don't think we =
can always assume they're lying. If the information comes through a medium,=
 one of the first items to address is whether or not the medium received th=
e message correctly and then whether or not he/she interepreted it correctl=
y and phrased it in a way that allowed the recipient to understand the spir=
it's meaning. There are a variety of ways spirits communicate with mediums;=
 some are easier than others to understand and pass on. For the harder meth=
ods, it would be possible for a medium to inadvertently misinterept the mes=
sage based on his/her past experiences. 
>>>
>>>When we look at the questio=
n from the connection to EVP's and ghost boxes, we have to examine a few it=
ems. Was the spirit able to use the devices correctly to form the words he/=
she actually intended? This is a two step process. It can be difficult for =
them to not only pull the available energy into a useable form, but to also=
 form the correct words (think it as a foreigner learning English and sayin=
g "car" when they mean "star". They sound similar, but have very different =
meanings). 
>>>
>>>Did we understand the words they said? It's fairly easy =
to get them wrong, especially in instances where you aren't the first perso=
n to listen to the recording and someone else says, "Here listen to this. I=
 think they're saying (fill in the blank)". Our brains are going to tell us=
 (fill in the blank) simply because that thought is now prevalent. If we're=
 the only person listening to the recordings, the same mistake can be made.=
 The only conclusive way is to use equipment that can amplify and break dow=
n the recordings to make them clear enough to be agreed upon by a number of=
 people who don't know what conclusions the other listeners have drawn. 
>>=
>
>>>The idea of a spirit distorting the facts must also be considered. Not=
 lying, per se, but rather getting the facts within their reality confused.=
 This is where you have the right to have the facts validated by the spirit=
. Ask them to prove it to you. They can tell you some corresponding items t=
hat back up their claims, direct you to old newspaper stories or to a perso=
n they used to affiliate with or bring the validation into your focus (mean=
ing the same thing comes into your life while you're driving/working/ at ho=
me/talking to someone/reading and etc.) at least three times. A spirit who =
is being truthful will not mind trying to make this happen. 
>>>
>>>Once th=
ese have been considered and eliminated, then we should be willing to enter=
tain the idea the spirit may be a lower energy being (a bully/swindler/ con=
-man or woman/narcissist and etc) in their past life and this is the only w=
ay they know how to achieve what they want. And yes, those spirits do exist=
. "As in life, so in death", meaning our personalities don't change when ou=
r bodies die.
>>>
>>>Al, maybe he wasn't trying to prove anything. Is it po=
ssible the spirit voice didn't mean he WAS (typed larger for emphasis) Stev=
e Tate, but rather wanted to talk ABOUT Steve Tate or get a message TO Stev=
e Tate? Did he mean to say "Still fate"? Could he have meant "paratrooper" =
? See where I'm going with this? 
>>>
>>>And finally, in regards to the "en=
d of the world stuff", it has been taught to me by mediums and teachers who=
 were all very honest and excellent at what they do, and it has been relaye=
d to me by spirits I've encountered in my mediumship service that we don't =
have a free glimpse of the future once our bodies die and we move into spir=
it form. I mean no offense and I'm not impying that wasn't what was heard. =
That said (or rather 'typed'), I'd be VERY hesitant to believe this communi=
cation. There are beings that are privvy to the potential (underscore "pote=
ntial") future in our lives, but it isn't their nature to join us for EVP s=
essions. 
>>>
>>>I hope I haven't taken liberty with this forum by posting =
such a long reply. I thank you for your time and attention. If you have oth=
er questions or would like me to clarify something, please ask. I'd be hono=
red to share what I know and track down what I don't. :) 
>>>
>>>Michelle
>=
>>
>>>
>> 
>

<div><br>=
</div>
<div>I've always loved this end of the world stuff.  The way I =
see it, if the world ends, I'm dead and I don't care.  I could just as=
 easily die tomorrow driving to work.  So if there is something you sh=
ould do while you are alive then do it.  Otherwise who cares about wor=

<div> I've been doing =
"box" work for almost ten years, and I still get to the decepticons( liars)=
. Perhaps it's just a level out there, as I think there is an inifinite num=
ber of levels and/or demensions. Maybe there is a demonic level? I have a g=
roup that communicates, and they usually tell "this is an apple", a metapho=
r for a truth. Not all of these voices are spirit per se`, some have never =
been human, there is a group out there called the fish group, a group =
of entities that exist off planet and really enjoy screwing with EVPers. &n=
bsp;I think it was the people-I forget their names, experimenting in Luxemb=
erg quite some time ago that first got the Fish Group. </div>

<div> <=
/div>
<div> For me, I don't really care what comes through, it's the f=
act that something talks that shouldn't be there, my approach hasd always b=
een on the technical side. </div>
<div> </div>
<div> I get some m=
ediumistic contacts/visions, and I have some spirits that seemingly prefer =
telepathic contacts, but I don't take that as anymore gosple than anyt=
hing else. Most of the "communication" tends to be extremely trivial i=
n nature. </div>

<div> </div>
<div> As far as end of the world s=
tuff, I do get that, alot of it, in almost every session, they insist it's =
true, at least as far as end of the cycle goes, but, and it's a big but, wh=
o knows what level/source that is from--they claim not to be human. Plus we=
 do have access to the future, if I do my meditation regularly I see almost=
 everything ahead of time, plus I dream it, and I know everyone on this pla=
net. I would expect spirit to be much more aware, at least after they reach=
 a higher state. Human is not the highest level, so you can't compare every=
thing to what y'all think you know. </div>

<div> </div>
<div> Fr=
ank-S</div>

<div> </div>

<div class=3D"gmail_quote">On Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 11:47 AM=
, michellewisbith <span dir=3D"ltr"><<a rel=3D"nofollow" target=3D"_blan=
k" href=3D"http://mc/compose?to=3Dmwisbith@...">mwisbith@hotmail. c=

<blockquote class=3D"gmail_quote" style=3D"BO=
RDER-LEFT:rgb(204,204,204) 1px solid;">
<div style=3D"BACKGROUND-COLOR:rgb(=
255,255,255);"><span> </span> 
<div>
<div>
<div>
<p><br><br>Hello, all=
.<br><br>My name is Michelle. I'm a certified medium with a Spiritualist ch=
urch. This was a two year process which involved proving I can communicate =
with spirits to a congregation (not bragging - just trying to explain my ba=
ckground and why I know what I do). I'm also one of the biggest skeptics yo=
u'll ever meet (It was one of two reasons I became a medium. I wanted to se=
e how they were "faking" it. Surprise! They weren't). I'd like to contribut=
e what I've learned about spirits. As Jill wrote, "I(t) really takes person=
al experience to believe this stuff exists".<br>
<br>As to her main questio=
n of "Why do spirits lie", I don't think we can always assume they're lying=
. If the information comes through a medium, one of the first items to addr=
ess is whether or not the medium received the message correctly and then wh=
ether or not he/she interepreted it correctly and phrased it in a way that =
allowed the recipient to understand the spirit's meaning. There are a varie=
ty of ways spirits communicate with mediums; some are easier than others to=
 understand and pass on. For the harder methods, it would be possible for a=
 medium to inadvertently misinterept the message based on his/her past expe=
riences. <br>
<br>When we look at the question from the connection to EVP's=
 and ghost boxes, we have to examine a few items. Was the spirit able to us=
e the devices correctly to form the words he/she actually intended? This is=
 a two step process. It can be difficult for them to not only pull the avai=
lable energy into a useable form, but to also form the correct words (think=
 it as a foreigner learning English and saying "car" when they mean "star".=
 They sound similar, but have very different meanings). <br>
<br>Did we und=
erstand the words they said? It's fairly easy to get them wrong, especially=
 in instances where you aren't the first person to listen to the recording =
and someone else says, "Here listen to this. I think they're saying (fill i=
n the blank)". Our brains are going to tell us (fill in the blank) simply b=
ecause that thought is now prevalent. If we're the only person listening to=
 the recordings, the same mistake can be made. The only conclusive way is t=
o use equipment that can amplify and break down the recordings to make them=
 clear enough to be agreed upon by a number of people who don't know what c=
onclusions the other listeners have drawn. <br>
<br>The idea of a spirit di=
storting the facts must also be considered. Not lying, per se, but rather g=
etting the facts within their reality confused. This is where you have the =
right to have the facts validated by the spirit. Ask them to prove it to yo=
u. They can tell you some corresponding items that back up their claims, di=
rect you to old newspaper stories or to a person they used to affiliate wit=
h or bring the validation into your focus (meaning the same thing comes int=
o your life while you're driving/working/ at home/talking to someone/readin=
g and etc.) at least three times. A spirit who is being truthful will not m=
ind trying to make this happen. <br>
<br>Once these have been considered an=
d eliminated, then we should be willing to entertain the idea the spirit ma=
y be a lower energy being (a bully/swindler/ con-man or woman/narcissist an=
d etc) in their past life and this is the only way they know how to achieve=
 what they want. And yes, those spirits do exist. "As in life, so in death"=
, meaning our personalities don't change when our bodies die.<br>
<br>Al, m=
aybe he wasn't trying to prove anything. Is it possible the spirit voice di=
dn't mean he WAS (typed larger for emphasis) Steve Tate, but rather wanted =
to talk ABOUT Steve Tate or get a message TO Steve Tate? Did he mean to say=
 "Still fate"? Could he have meant "paratrooper" ? See where I'm going with=
 this? <br>
<br>And finally, in regards to the "end of the world stuff", it=
 has been taught to me by mediums and teachers who were all very honest and=
 excellent at what they do, and it has been relayed to me by spirits I've e=
ncountered in my mediumship service that we don't have a free glimpse of th=
e future once our bodies die and we move into spirit form. I mean no offens=
e and I'm not impying that wasn't what was heard. That said (or rather 'typ=
ed'), I'd be VERY hesitant to believe this communication. There are beings =
that are privvy to the potential (underscore "potential") future in our liv=
es, but it isn't their nature to join us for EVP sessions. <br>
<br>I hope =
I haven't taken liberty with this forum by posting such a long reply. I tha=
nk you for your time and attention. If you have other questions or would li=
ke me to clarify something, please ask. I'd be honored to share what I know=
 and track down what I don't. :) <br>
<br>Michelle<br><br></p></div>
